name: Stickman Simulator: Zombie Battle
description:
There is another zombie apocalypse in the stick world! ( yes, there are many :P )
Stickman Simulator: Zombie Battle allows you to become an epic stickman hero and save the world from the zombie invasion. The destiny of a real hero awaits!

• Lots of gore, killing and blood!
• 3D stickman troops and battlefield
• tabs style gameplay!


Music:MetalRenard_This-Stained-Portrait
Sounds:freesound.org
